newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan stocks end up ahead of settlement day.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan stocks end up ahead of settlement day.

text.p: Pakistan stocks ended higher on Tuesday on short-covering in select blue chips ahead of Wednesday's settlement day, but Karachi dealers said overall sentiment remained mixed as investors stayed out.

"Trading activity picked up towards the close and select blue chips rose on short-covering," dealer Ali Asghar said. "But overall sentiment was mixed as investors, wary of Pakistan's economic troubles, remained on the sidelines."
The 100-share index rose 10.46 points, or 0.69 percent, to end at 1,535.49. Gainers beat losers 124 to 121. Hub Power rose 0.50 rupees to 36.70. -- Amir Zia 9221-5685192
